author: jimmygchen
content:
I've made a PR to propose a slight update to the reconstruction & cross seeding requirements for non supernodes and would like to hear some feedback on this. 

**TL;DR**: this changes the cross seeding requirements on **non**-custody columns from **SHOULD** to **MAY**, so non supernodes doesn't have to publish the same amount of data as supernodes on reconstruction.

https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/4657
